p: Lemon oil expressed is intended to be added to feed for all animal species without withdrawal. The maximum proposed use level in complete feed is 40 mg/kg for chickens for fattening and turkeys for fattening, 55 mg/kg for laying hens, 75 mg/kg for piglets, 90 mg/kg for pigs for fattening, veal calves, cattle for fattening and dairy cows, 110 mg/kg for lactating sows, 155 mg/kg for horses, 30 mg/kg for sheep, goats and rabbits, 40 mg/kg for salmons and 20 mg/kg for dogs, cats and ornamental fish.
